questionTitle: ___ orbits the Sun, Uranus rotates on its axis, an imaginary line through its center.
The light from a laser differs _____ produced by other sources, such as electric bulbs, fluorescent lamps, and the sun.
________ he would have come to class.
anwers: If Mike is able to finish his homework
Would Mike be able to finish his homework
If Mike could finish his homework
If Mike had been able to finish his homework

questionTitle: All the cereal grains ________ grow on the prairies and plains of the United States.
Generally speaking, people should have ________ as their desires will allow.
Richard Nixon had been a lawyer and ________ before he entered politics.
anwers: served in the Navy as an officer
the Navy had him as an officer
did service in the Navy as an officer

questionTitle: Scientists believe that the beaver's instinct to build dams is more complex than ________ other animal instinct.

________ at 212 degrees F. and freezes at 32 degrees F.

According to some records, Carl Sandburg ________ was expelled from West Point Military Academy because of deficiencies in English.
anwers: he was a poet and literary genius

questionTitle: Warning: ________ or operate heavy equipment while taking this medication.
